content: -New version of Solidity 8.4 -Ability to set commissions for the purchase / sale of coins separately -The ability to change commissions and the address of their enrollment through Deploy at any time -The Supply variable has been simplified, now it is enough to specify the number of zeros (for example, 9 - a billion coins) -Contract verified. Well, the most important thing! Now well-known scanners (the most popular honeypot.is) give scam coins that your project does not look like mead)Were you afraid of being scammed because of the law? Now no one will look in your direction, because you can simply set a commission of 90%, so the chart will not look like mead (that no one can sell a coin) You are at 0% scammers, because the commissions for crypto trading are set by the projects themselvesComplete guide and script!Price 1BNB.tg. @feratumvertuhttps://postimg.cc/Fk1MsDhrhttps://postimg.cc/14jxYhKf
